title: (04647) Los Jurados - Unnamed Road
description: Diner without more history. A total of four tables, with views of the mountains on one side and the sea on the other. worth to eat

title: (04640) Pulpí - Poligono S-AG2A, 33
description: Parking to visit the Pulpi Geode

title: (04648) Jaravia-Pulip - C.Liano 39-41
description: About 14 parking spaces, 1 WC, 1 shower, water/no drinking water!! Supply/disposal, 1 washing machine, free wifi (partially on site), etc. The owner speaks several languages. Electricity. until 30.4. , from May to August, please register in advance and ask

title: (04648) Pulpí - 54 Poligono S-RTU8B
description: Spot on the edge of the beach accessible to any motorhome. A few trees for shade. Refueling 5 minutes by bike

title: (04648) Pulpí - 7 Poligono S-RTU8B
description: Nice place to stay right by the beach.

title: (04648) Pulpí - 69 Poligono P.p.sector Costa 2
description: Free parking, it is dirt, but completely flat. next to the beach with showers, beach bar, wastebaskets ....

title: (04648) San Juan de los Terreros - 5 Calle Júpiter
title_short: (04648) San Juan de los Terreros - 5 Calle Júpiter
description: Huge quiet and calm mixed car park Asphalt unbuilt residential place next to a wooded park beach 200 meters away

title: (04648) Pozo del Esparto -
description: Large car park facing the sea. No services.

title: (04648) Almeria - 10 Calle Columbia
description: large car park

title: (04648) Pozo del Esparto -
description: Quiet area, room for 2/3 smaller campers. over looking the sea. seems to allowed to camp anywhere in winter. no signs.

title: (04648) Pulpí - 28 Calle Cabezo Pichirichi
description: Beautiful place for a van, staying overnight and spending the day, access to the area is charged 65ctm per hour, but at 10:30 pm and starts again at 10:30. It is 2 meters from the beach

title: (04648) Pulpí - 3P Lugar Urbanizacion Puerto Chrommelynck
description: Parking in a dead end street. The trip to the top is without problems. There is parking left and right. Very quiet, in the evening or in the morning locals come walking their dogs.

title: (04648) San Juan de los Terreros - 95 Avenida Puerta Litoral Andaluz
title_short: (04648) San Juan de los Terreros - 95 Avenida Puerta Litoral Andaluz
description: Parking located in the center of the city. Free right now. Very spacious

title: (30893) Almendricos - 18 Avenida del Muelle
description:
Starting point of the Via Verde Almendricos-Guadix.
Very quiet place with boards, benches and trashes bins.

title: (04648) Pozo del Esparto - 164 Barriada Pozo del Esparto
title_short: (04648) Pozo del Esparto - 164 Barriada Pozo del Esparto
description: Seaside. Alone in this month of January. Idyllic, feet in the water.

title: (04648) San Juan de los Terreros - 207 Calle Delfín
title_short: (04648) San Juan de los Terreros - 207 Calle Delfín
description: Open Wash drums 12 and 16 kilos. Tumble dry 18 kilos up to 80 degrees. Separate washing machine for dog blankets. Parking in front of the door possible, for large mobile parking 100 meters down the street.

title: (04648) San Juan de los Terreros - 10 Calle Leonardo da Vinci
title_short: (04648) San Juan de los Terreros - 10 Calle Leonardo da Vinci
description: Beach txiringuito parking. It is wide and called, of land. There are restrooms for the bar outside the premises, open. There are garbage cans. You can't camp on the beach, but there's nothing here. The baker passes by at 9 in a van. Very quiet on the beach.

title: (04648) Pozo del Esparto - Cam. Pozo del Esparto
title_short: (04648) Pozo del Esparto - Cam. Pozo del Esparto
description: Parking by the beach. quiet in low season.

title: (04648) San Juan de los Terreros - 41T Poligono S-RTU4
title_short: (04648) San Juan de los Terreros - 41T Poligono S-RTU4
description: Large area with small bushes, lots of space and easily accessible. Street to see and hear, no sea view - unless you have a 4x4. A pretty steppe setting. No trash can on site. They are available nearby, there are also supermarkets, bars etc. ATTENTION ⚠️ Do not leave shoes in front of the motorhome at night. Little white dog? catch her and kidnap her??

name: Casa Los Lobos
title: (30893) Casa Los Lobos
description: Great welcome near Lorca. We parked within their property which has been fitted out to accommodate vans and motorhomes. Kevin and Mimi are very nice and very helpful. Swimming pool, impeccable sanitary facilities, kitchen area, even a television area. The owners even offer meals or drinks. Belgian beer lovers will be delighted, we had a very relaxing and refreshing stopover.

title: (04648) Almeria - 44M Diseminado el Cocon
description: Large parking lot despite some ruts. The police just passed by. Cradled by the waves.

title: (04648) Cuevas del Almanzora - 31 Cala Panizo
description: Wonderful, earthy, quiet place for max 2 smaller vehicles right on the beach in a cul-de-sac. Cellular very good. Please leave it clean and leave space for the fishermen

title: (04648) San Juan De Los Terreros - Unnamed Road
title_short: (04648) San Juan De Los Terreros - Unnamed Road
description: Along the coast without any services

title: (04619) Los Lobos -
description: Easier to access than the car park advertised in the village "Los lobos". Take the dead end 100m after the bridge towards Aguillas. Nothing idyllic, but flat ground, sheltered from the wind... can help out for one night...

title: (04619) Cuevas del Almanzora - 10A Calle los Especieros
title_short: (04619) Cuevas del Almanzora - 10A Calle los Especieros
description: A fantastic spot on the edge of a picturesque village enjoying crickets and frogs at night. a nature reserve with breathtaking views. In the village there is a cafe / restaurant and a supermarket every day, the mobile baker also comes on Sundays. beach 5 km away.

title: () San Juan De Los Terreros -
description:
Spanish ruin illegally occupied by people
All welcome
Best regards

title: (30889) Calarreona - Cam Playa de los Cocedores
title_short: (30889) Calarreona - Cam Playa de los Cocedores
description: Good place! The place is beautiful! The police come regularly to check if everything is ok, but nothing more. Because the space for mobile homes is actually over 5.2mtr. Length forbidden, the sign is right at the entrance to the square! The baker comes around 8-8:30 to sell her bread.

title: (30889) Calarreona - Cam. Playa de la Carolina
title_short: (30889) Calarreona - Cam. Playa de la Carolina
description: Nice parking lot with access to two spectacular coves. There are garbage cans. Length limit: 5.2 meters. Please don't take out tables or awnings!!

title: (30889) Águilas - RM-333
description: A beautiful wild beach. No services. It says that the length limit is 5.2 meters but in winter it is full of motorhomes over 5.2 m.

name: Camping La Quinta Bella (Flordevida)
title: (30880) Camping La Quinta Bella (Flordevida)
description: Quiet campsite in the middle of the hills. The plots are larger than elsewhere, you can park your car and caravan on your own. The staff and residents will welcome you warmly and will be happy to provide you with information. When the bar is open (Tuesdays, Thursdays, Fridays from 1 to 4 p.m. and Saturdays from 7 p.m.), the chef's creative cuisine is a must-see as well as the desserts of Terry, the owner. If you feel like it, you can join the dance, tai chi and painting classes. The walks with your dogs start from the site itself and take you to the mandarin orchards. About ten kilometers from magnificent beaches and the typically Spanish town of Águilas, calm is assured.

title: () Cuevas del Almanzora - AL-7107
description: One of the many parking places. Quite far from the road. Small staircase to go down to the beach. For vans possibility to go down the water by a fairly steep track, see last photo.

title: () Cuevas del Almanzora - AL-7107
description: Cala Dos Hermanas Quiet place by the sea. Land access road to avoid if it rains a lot. We went with a 5.4m Fiat Ducato.

title: (04648) El Calón - Unnamed Road
description: Directly at the sea! The entrance is not easy to see, very small and very steep! Anglers and kayakers come early in the morning... Camping is not allowed here. But parking is. Please behave accordingly. The 4G reception is very poor, almost non-existent... The place is not very clean. Please take everything with you when you leave so that everyone can have a lot of fun parking for a long time.

title: (04600) Huércal-Overa - A-350
description: Parking near the road. Possible most certainly for the night because no prohibition. Accessible to large riders like us (bus). Do not hesitate to go to the restaurant opposite (La Cruce) .

title: (04600) Huércal-Overa - 460 Calle Alondra
description: Open area with some trees, and toilets with water.

name: Camper Area Aníbal
title: (30889) Camper Area Aníbal
description: Camper Area Aníbal. Anibal gas station near Aguilas has been transformed. Small bar and 3 pétanque tracks. Timed token shower, emptying and filling included in daily rate. Wi-Fi included. not very well placed and a bit noisy during the day but everything is very clean.

title: (30889) Águilas - 54 RM-333
description: Service area without parking, at the Annibal service station, next to the area of the same name. Very kind. Ask for the key at the station. Here, you can request the filling of your gas cylinders (except Spanish cylinder) with LPG.

name: Apartamento Rico's
title: (30893) Apartamento Rico's
description:
Villa Almendricos is a lovely safe quiet place with superb 360 degree views of the nearby mountains and surrounded by nature. Tarmac access all the way apart from the last 100 metres which is by firm track. Only 15 minutes from the A7 Autovia Del Mediterraneo at Puerto Lumbreras on quiet scenic roads.

This is an ideal place to spend a night or two, or longer with great views, both sunrise and sunset and clear starry nights. Water and electricity included, plus black waste disposal and or use of onsite toilet plus washing machine available (extra charge) Also available fully equipped self contained holiday rental apartment "Rico's Retreat" on site, available to book through AirBnB etc. great if you want stay or have visiting family or friends.

Adult Only Swimming pool and outside shower only available if not being used by holiday rental guests. Great area for walking or cycling or just sitting back and relaxing.

Please note that this is a small rustic camping and currently we only have marked space for three motorhomes so please make contact before arriving, although we do have extra room, thank you.

title: (30889) Calarreona -
description: Parking at the bottom of a really quiet dirt road for motorhomes up to 7 meters at the edge of the cliff

title: (30889) Calarreona -
description:
Parking directly on the beach, access authorized up to 5.5 meters.
Bins available, directly on the sandy beach

title: (04618) Cuevas del Almanzora - AL-7107
description: Place for one (or two) at the end of this road, at the old tunnel entrance. You can crouch through the tunnel, only one entrance is low. There is also a spot on top of the wall (as seen from the road) and next to the wall, but those are both close to the road. Quiet, no shade, no services, no cell reception at all (no GSM).

name: Camping & Bungalows Bellavista
title: (30889) Camping & Bungalows Bellavista
description: Place is neat and clean. The pool is nice but only open from 11. Well located to get to the beach. Reception rather unfriendly in the evening, friendly in the morning. Pricing confusing we were only told when we left that our child (2 years) would also cost. Children are billed from 1 - in my opinion very expensive for a small child. Pitches are quite spacious and shaded with a tarpaulin - even on rainy days the heat builds up here until late in the nice ans ckean

title: (04618) Cuevas del Almanzora -
description: Location below the road. Flat, waterfront location, amazing view. You can hardly hear the road, no opposite. No network.

title: (30889) Águilas - 34 Lugar Matalentisco
description: Not indicated on the map, we followed the parking for the marina nearby, but we wanted free parking. This is not the best area as there is parking near a beach, but as long as you slow down, this is an ideal place to stay. A restaurant / bar is just a short walk away and if you keep walking along the beach, you will reach the Castle-Castillo de San Juan. Which is closed until March 31 (I think). It is quite popular with walkers and runners and is close enough to the road. We do not have dogs, but we have seen tons of dogs in the area, so dogs are welcome.

title: () Cuevas del Almanzora - AL-7107
description: Quiet place with very nice views. Narrow downhill road for large motorhomes. Small access staircase. Avoid if it rained. No Camping. Overnight stay prohibited.

title: (30889) Águilas - 29 Lugar Matalentisco
description: Quiet place to park. No service. Close to the beach, bars and restaurants.

title: () Cuevas del Almanzora - AL-7107
description: Small car park below the road facing the sea, for one or two small trucks, take the road that descends then the path for 400 meters with a small beach accessible on foot by a path 100 meters away. No service.

title: (30889) Águilas - 22 Calle Musico Sebastian Zaragoza
description: Parking along the public road near Mercadona. No facilities.

title: (30880) Águilas - 38 Calle de Juan Ramon Jimenez
title_short: (30880) Águilas - 38 Calle de Juan Ramon Jimenez
description: Very tranquil street spot near the high chimney, with nice views, including the castle. I really enjoyed this place. Much better than the nearby approach road to Mercadona where campers often park. Spent several days and nights here with no issues. If you go south straight to the beach (about 700m?) you will find good water taps (foot showers, so take a funnel).

title: (04619) Los Lobos - AL-7107
description: Esparto well. there are several vacant lots. According to law it is PROHIBITED to spend the night. There is a shower and lavapiés in the joint cove. The only drawback is that the people in the area are very curious and sometimes they call the police if you have a dog (according to what they tell me) otherwise great. The bath is not very good because of the rocks but the beach is clean.

title: (30880) Águilas - Carr. de Lorca
description: German gas bottles can be exchanged or refilled here.

title: (30889) Águilas - 7 Calle 6
description: Large petrol station with lavomatic. several machines drying. also washing area vehicles and pressure. big and very clean

title: (30889) Águilas - 3 Lugar el Labradorcico
description: Laundromat at BP TRUCKS STOPS station.

title: (04618) El Arteal - AL-7107
description: Flat Parking near AL-7101 road. Quiet by night and empty in January. Nice spot to rest.

title: (04691) Huércal-Overa - AL-9107
description: Pleasant and shaded area for a break, gas and restaurant in front

title: (30880) Águilas - 36 Calle Doctor Luis Prieto
description: Cheap gas and free water. You can even hit the windshield...

title: () Cuevas del Almanzora - AL-7107
description: Very nice place, off the road, beach light against low, no services. Quiet and clean.

title: (04618) Cuevas del Almanzora - AL-7107
description: Secluded, quiet parking space for 2-3 campers. The ruins can be visited on a 10-minute hike. Very nice sunrises. Stood here alone for 2 nights on the weekend.

title: (04618) El Arteal - Unnamed Road
description: A place in a secluded quiet bay with a pebble beach. Very nice sea view, great sunrises over the sea. There is a rubbish bin (it is unclear when it will be emptied, it is currently very full). Arrival: The small and narrow path must be driven to the very end, but is not passable for larger motorhomes. From here the ruins on the mountain can be visited and other bays can be explored on foot. Occasionally anglers come by. We stood here alone for two nights.

title: (04618 ) Cuevas del Almanzora - AL-7107
description: Quiet place, next to some very old constructions, nice views and space around with old tunnels, recommended if you like to explore the area.

title: () Cuevas del Almanzora - AL-7107
description: AUGUST 17, 2020 DAY AND NIGHT Camper experience: Viewpoint / parking just before reaching Cala Reona, along a dirt track that descends from the same general road. It is in perfect condition and conservation. It doesn't say that you can't sleep here, so we did it and everything was perfect. Very few people in the cove. Great for snorkelling. And sleeping we were alone, surrounded by sea and mountains. Absolutely recommended 100%

title: (30880) Águilas - 35 Avenida Juan Carlos I
description: Laundromat. 3 washing machines of 8kg 5th, 3 maxi at 8th and 3 dryers at 3rd per half hour. clean and functional. open 8am-10pm be careful parking is not easy in Aguilas, we came by bike.

title: (04691) Almería - A-7
description:
Cepsa station
Truck and vehicle parking
Just ask at the station reception or at least let them know that we are going to sleep.
To fill up with water, ask at reception and you will be given the tap handle
Shop with the possibility of using the microwave
Restaurant (currently closed)
Peaceful place
Pleasant and smiling seller

title: (04616) Villaricos -
description: Relatively drivable spot that is isolated from the road. Wonderful view with a pebble beach

title: (30880) Águilas - 31 Calle Puerto de Poniente
description: Parking by the sea at the end of a dead end, near a pier and at the foot of the cliff. No service

title: (04616) Villaricos -
description: Under the cast iron chimney. Space for a vehicle. Level and good views. Several coves nearby to bathe with pebbles and one of them with a litter bin. On the other side of the road there are some smoke tunnels that are worth visiting. There are several similar places in the area to spend the night. Complicated access for AC or large Camper

title: (04618) Cuevas del Almanzora - AL-7107
description: Nice quiet place at the sea.

title: (04616) Villaricos -
description: Super quiet place in a flat place by the sea. You are sheltered between earthen walls. A bit of a drive down from the main road, but doable with a 9 meter camper. The sea can be reached by descending through rocks

title: (30880) Águilas - 1 Camino del Cementerio
description: Camino del Cementerio, Aguilas

title: () Cuevas del Almanzora - AL-7107
description: A circular place for up to 2 campers. Road surface is fine in dry condition.

title: (30880) Águilas - 8 Calle Explanada del Muelle
description: We spent a Friday night and the music from the restaurant that is 50 meters away bothered us until 3 in the morning. We decided not to repeat on Saturday night since the music started again at about 5:00 p.m. Being Saturday, the parking lot was filled with cars and getting out was difficult. Midweek in low season is recommended.

title: (30880) Águilas - s/n Calle Explanada del Muelle
title_short: (30880) Águilas - s/n Calle Explanada del Muelle
description: Quiet parking with beautiful views

title: (30880) Águilas - 23 Calle Murcia
description: Plot of land within Águilas, spacious and quiet for parking, with a slight unevenness. I spent 3 nights during the carnivals and without problems, or any noise, 15min walk from the center.

title: (30880) Águilas - Calle C-M Ua Nº1
description: Free parking fenced and night lighting, RV authorized

title: () Cuevas del Almanzora - AL-7107
description: Cove the Invincible. Nice cove with enough area for several vehicles. Very calm. We were completely alone at the beginning of September. Very close to the quiet town of Villaricos

title: (04610) Cuevas del Almanzora -
description:
Very quiet place, very good access
bbq avaleble  
Water tap in the left corner of the parking!

title: (04619) -
description: Aire de camping-cars avec accès payant 10€ sur le site du Lunar Câble Park Super sport

title: () Huércal-Overa -
description: Quiet and good walking opportunities. Heading up to Huercal LA Vieja. Some steep and narrow road so NOT suitable for larger motorhomes. We were there with a 5m van. Is also a place on the opposite side of the road in more forest / shade. Met some locals on motorcycles, a car passed on day 2 and people walking dogs in the area. The road continues but we didn't try to drive higher up

title: (04610) Cuevas del Almanzora - 1 Calle Picasso
description: Parking next to the park and near the center.

title: (30880) Águilas - 210L Calle Goleta
description: Parking for the day. Next to the beach and a short walk from town.  No restrictions   Gets busy with locals visiting the beach.  Not recommend if it is rainy weather

title: (04616) Villaricos -
description: We came in May, we stayed the night. Perfect place, few people and very quiet. Garbage cans are everywhere on the street. There are several entrances. stone beach. You can stay overnight here, only camping behavior is prohibited.

title: (04610) Cuevas del Almanzora - 1D Plaza la Libertad
title_short: (04610) Cuevas del Almanzora - 1D Plaza la Libertad
description: Water fountain next to the castle of the Marqués de los Vélez where you can visit the Archaeological Museum, an essential place to understand the importance that this enclave and its surroundings had in Phoenician and Roman times. In the square there is a very complete food market with stalls of everything and even bars. It is important to ask the prices before buying ...

name: Mountain View Camp Site
title: (04600) Mountain View Camp Site
description: Camping Huercal-Overa is temporarily closed as it is under construction. The access is still a bit difficult. Very nicely located between the hills, near the castle and a 20 to 30 minute walk to the city. Water (not drinking water) will be offered, service for Gray and Blackwater soon. Shower and toilet, children's play and pool facilities are available. Also a washing machine to do laundry. Short walk to National Forest, great for walking and cycling. Pet and family friendly.

title: (04610) Cuevas del Almanzora - Unnamed Road
description: Easily accessible parking space without service, we stood completely undisturbed for one night, space not visible from the street, nothing special but completely sufficient for one night

title: (04616) Cuevas del Almanzora - 127 Barriada Villaricos
description:
Beautiful place, super quiet. Quite a few motorhomes with awnings and chairs outside
Very quiet place 5 minutes from the village by a hiking trail and with bars restaurants and shops

name: Burbujas Lavandería
title: (04610) Burbujas Lavandería
description:
Laundry with 3 washing machines and 2 dryers.
WiFi access (code on coin machine). Supermarket right next door. Parking directly behind the buildings.

title: (30880) Águilas - 1 Calle B
description: Parking for several dozen cars next to the shopping center where you can use the toilet. About two minutes to walk to the beach. Quiet and peaceful at night.

title: (04610) Cuevas del Almanzora - 37 Poligono Pe CU-1
title_short: (04610) Cuevas del Almanzora - 37 Poligono Pe CU-1
description: Ground parking, in Bernabe Lentisco street. But be careful, access from the top of said street, never from below due to the ramp that exists. Access by Cirera street, Tra. El Rulador and Pl. Pe Cu-1 street.

title: (04616) Cuevas del Almanzora - 116B Barriada Villaricos
description: Parking of the marina. At the bottom of the road. No noise and no problem. Has no barrier For the day only

title: (30880) Águilas - 13 Avenida del Hornillo
description: Small parking lot on the beach at the mosaic steps of Hornillo. Nearby is a very large P place for possible. larger motorhomes. No amenities. But out of season I don't foresee any problems staying overnight.

title: (30880) Águilas - 2 Calle H
description: We didn't like the Herillo car park, too many vehicles passing through. We slept here with another German motorhome. We were not disturbed.

title: (04600) Huércal-Overa - 2 Calle Doctor Barbacid
description: Laundromat open from 7 a.m. to 11 p.m.

title: (04616) Cuevas del Almanzora - 247 Calle la Purisima
title_short: (04616) Cuevas del Almanzora - 247 Calle la Purisima
description:
A flat hard pack surface level parking area elevated above Villericos.  We have a tag axle carthago so have to be carefull not to get stuck or bottom out on ridges and this is perfect (so far). The french couple next door say its fine for overnighting and no problems with the police. 
I share this as it appears to be a perfect little spot for 1 or 2 nights in Villericos.

title: (04617) Cuevas del Almanzora - 10 Calle Vista Almagro
title_short: (04617) Cuevas del Almanzora - 10 Calle Vista Almagro
description: Freely accessible truck scales up to 60t. Minimum weight 400kg, accuracy 20kg. Unfortunately, there are no details on how to operate the machine. Only that it costs 3 euros and that a ticket comes from the machine.

title: (30880) Murcia - C. Azorin
description: Mixed car park 150 meters from the beach, quiet area, good for one night, accessible to any size of motorhome in the off season Garbage cans

title: (04600) Huércal-Overa - 37 Avenida Guillermo Reyna
description: Laundromat open from 8 a.m. to 10 p.m. 7/7

title: (30890) Puerto Lumbreras - Unnamed Road
description: Huge car park behind the omnisports hall, tarred or not, as you wish.

title: (04600) Huércal-Overa - 3 Travesía Alameda
description: Large free parking space with supply and disposal. There is a chip for fresh water in the sports hall for fresh water.

title: (04616) Villaricos -
description: Permanent water point and beach shower.

title: (04616) Villaricos -
description: A very large free car park. Overnight stays in vehicles are accepted here. We were here in mid-August with many other motorhomes and caravans. The place can also be found on Google Maps. There it is called Motorhome Wild Camp Spot. There are restaurants nearby, but you have to book in advance.

name: Camperpark
title: (30880) Camperpark
description: Dümo Camperpark Aguilas, the site was taken over and renovated by Dümo on 9/1/22. The owner is a German company, the employees here are multilingual, Spanish, French, English, German. The space is very spacious and also offers space for liners. Bar with small gastronomy and baguette service. Many recreational opportunities, private pool, boules court, bike paths, hiking. Shops and Aguilas about 3 km. To the sea about 2 km. Beautiful location on the hill with great views and very quiet.

title: (30880) Águilas - 35 Calle A
description: The right side of the street that goes down to the yellow beach is full of parking, it is on a steep slope

name: Resort Indalo
title: (04620) Resort Indalo
description: A lovely Camperstop with very clean facilities . Can be difficult to find . We took a GPS coordinate at the Entrance/ Reception which may help others. N37°15'45" W1°51'18" washing machine a bit pricey but still a great value Camperstop

name: Camping Vera
title: (04610) Camping Vera
description: Family campsite on the edge of a private airstrip.

title: (04617) Palomares -
description: Beautiful place to spend day and night, quite quiet and spacious, flat terrain and no shadows.

name: Camping CUEVAS DEL ALMANZORA
title: (04617) Camping CUEVAS DEL ALMANZORA
description: Quiet campsite with all the services included with the entrance fee: swimming pool, jacuzzi, petanque court, restaurant, water change, etc. Large pitches, approximately 20 m2.

title: (04617) Cuevas del Almanzora - Camino De Los Angeles
title_short: (04617) Cuevas del Almanzora - Camino De Los Angeles
description: A very wide track suitable for vehicles runs along the coast for more than 500m. You can park there flat and swim directly (no beach). There is a lot of traffic and a bit of shade but out of season, no other vehicle than our motorhome...

title: (30890) Puerto Lumbreras - 3 Calle Tejera
description: Parking in Castillo Nogalte Puerto Lumbreras. Cafeteria Restaurant open from 8:00 pm and interesting surroundings to visit

title: (04617) Palomares, Almería - AL 7107
description: Water point at a gas station. The tank can be filled with a nozzle. Of course, we also filled up our fuel here beforehand.

title: (30890) Puerto Lumbreras - 11 Calle Tejera
description: Large car park above the city, quiet and far from festive places. No service but good for a quiet night as long as you can sleep with the noise of the two highways which are both very close.

title: (30890) Puerto Lumbreras - 40 Calle Mayor
description:
3 washing machine 12kg
2 washing machine 16kg
4 dryers

title: (04617) Cuevas del Almanzora - Barriada Palomares
description: Playa de quitapellejos! Near Palomares Bajo. With ample parking along the entire beach, next to the beach bar there are showers and trash cans. Very calm and naturalist. Forbidden to motorhomes over 5m in lenght!

name: Camping VerdeVeras
title: (04620) Camping VerdeVeras
description: Come and stay with us, short term or long term! We are a rural eco-friendly Association providing low-impact cultural, educational and residential events in a natural environment. There are possibilities to work for free stays. We have space for tents, caravans and campervans. We have a solar-powered system here so please be energy conscious. Please note we do get muddy when it rains heavily. We have an outdoor communal kitchen, bar area, an outdoor pool, and a fire pit available for use. We would love for you to come and stay and see what South East Spain has to offer!

title: (04620) Vera - 39 Calle Rafael Alberti
description:
Dirt parking at the side of the road.
Not a lot of space.
Not really clean, people bring their dogs there to relieve themselves.
Not too noisy, we weren't bothered all night. For one night it helps.
Park 2 minutes by car for cycling, sports, walking the dog.

title: (04620) Vera - 156M Diseminado Diseminados
description:
Sunny, large gravel site, ideal for dog owners. directly adjacent to the small park.
Unfortunately the street is a bit noisy during the day but all good at night.

title: (04620) Vera - 3 Calle Poniente
description: Parking on the street near Lidl.

title: (30890) Puerto Lumbreras - 94 Avenida Rey Juan Carlos I
title_short: (30890) Puerto Lumbreras - 94 Avenida Rey Juan Carlos I
description: Plenoil gas station.

title: (04691) Úrcal -
description:
Parking for 3 units in grounds of private residential property. Follow gps to keep on road until 400m of track. Phone for availability prior to arrival. Secure, Showers, Toilets, Limited Electric possible, Outside sitting area with open fire, No lights other than starlight but solar lights available, €8 per night.
WhatsApp for accurate location and directions.

title: (04620) Vera - 11 Pasaje Saturno
description: Laundry. You can park on the street

title: (30890) Puerto Lumbreras - 120 Avenida Rey Juan Carlos I
title_short: (30890) Puerto Lumbreras - 120 Avenida Rey Juan Carlos I
description:
A new camper place (Nov '22) by Puerto Lumbreras. Right in front of the new Mercadona. Diagonally opposite the Plenoil gas station, cheap fuel! 
The center of the town is within walking distance.  Near the Oficina de Turismo which is opened occasionally.
Passing under the motorway you can go for good walks in the hills.

title: (30891) Puerto Lumbreras - Camino los Palomos 218
description: Casa-Lumbreras. Center of many excursions, mountains around, Ideal for cycling, hiking and other activities,

title: (04621) Vera - 14 Plaza Unidad a 12 Natsun
description: Parking on a large urbanization road, quiet and 5 minutes walk from the beach. On the beach, there are showers.

title: (04620) Vera - 4 Calle Ronda Verasol
description: Great place. Next to the bullring. There are containers.

title: (04621) Vera - 3 Plaza Unidad a 12 Natsun
description: It's the quietest part of Vera's nudist neighborhood, a dead-end street that only gives access to a small urbanization. 100m from the 100% naturist beach, with showers and services. next to the Pasodoble, also a naturist bar and restaurant. Depending on the time and place, parking may be scarce; in this case, the adjacent streets Aguadulce and Isla de Perejil are similar. Supermarket Consum 10 minutes walk.

title: (04620) Vera - S.N Calle Ancha
description: Repsol station with prophane bottle exchange. Only 11kg repsol bottles. No refill.

title: (04621) Vera - 13 Calle Aguadulce
description: Perfect place for 3 Camper or small motorhome...very friendly neighbors in the area...direct access to the beach...showers,...several beach bars and a shopping center 5 minutes away

title: (04662) Santa Bárbara - 19 Diseminado Santa Barbara
description: Very little interest except free self service water tap, picnic table and several barbecues.

title: (04621) Vera - 6 Avenida Ciudad de Castellón
description: We have been two nights and without problem with the police ... on the beach ... there shower and with several beach bars.

title: (04620) Vera - 1 Carretera de Ronda
description: Washing machines and dryers self-service

title: (04620) Vera - 14 Calle Alfarerías
description: Gravel area for approx. 2 x telephone calls, cafes, pizzeria etc

title: (04620) Vera - 1 Calle Adelfas
description: Sunny, unconfirmed. Relatively straight. About 10 places

title: (04621) -
description: Parking spaces in battlements or niches in a dead end giving access to a (naturist) beach. Shower and toilet on the beach less than 100 meters away. No prohibition signs, other vans and motorhomes were already parked. Quiet location (although lots of pedestrians, even at night) in residential area

title: (04629) Antas - Calle el Garcel
description: Parking area with workshop and gas station, as well as a restaurant in the industrial area.

title: (04620) Vera - 62 Avenida de Baria
description:
It's a gas station with a dog wash station, water gap, car cleaning etc. Good place to do a cleaning, fill up, etc.
It's 1€ per 2min for the dog wash. It has shampoo, conditioner, blow dryer, etc. If you have big dogs I'd recommend using the water tap to fill buckets, lather them up, rinse them off and blow dry.
Water tap is free.

name: Camperpark Oasis Al Mar
title: (04621) Camperpark Oasis Al Mar
description: Camperpark Oasis al Mar. Beautifully situated, very quiet, about 2.5 km from the sea. Very nice German operator. Pétanque pitch, free wifi. Often fully booked at the moment, it is better to call ahead or contact us by email.

name: Aire de service camping-car
title: (04620) Aire de service camping-car
description: Toilets, showers and washing machines are already there. Bike path on the beach. Pedestrian access to the city. Showers extra! Washing machine. Next to the town of Vera.

title: (30813) Purias - Camino Guirao 10
description: Here in southern Spain, between the town of Lorca and the port town of Aguilas, there is a small private camper place. A maximum of four campers can be accommodated here. The plot is scrap and the maximum length of the mobile home is 8.50 m. The site is completely fenced. A large well-kept swimming pool is available until the end of October. Next to the pool there is a large pavilion shower (hot/cold) for free use. A fully equipped communal kitchen is available. A service station is available. One adult per night 10 euros, each additional (from 14 years) 5 euros, children 2.50 € (up to 13 years) One dog is free, each additional dog 1.50 € From the 30th day the costs are reduced 20% Electricity is billed individually per kilowatt hour at €0.40, use of the washing machine costs €2.50, WiFi is available in the common area. The property is located on the outskirts of Purias, on the border with Andalusia, with excellent transport links in a quiet rural area. In just 20 minutes by car you are at the sea or in 10 minutes in Lorca. Here you will find everything your heart desires, modern shopping centers, banks, pharmacies, cafes, bars, restaurants and so on. Feel free to contact us by phone, WhatsApp or email

title: (04628) Antas - 46 Diseminado Ballabona
description: Possibility to fill your tank with clean water, and empty your waste water for free at this gas station

title: (30890) - 3 Calle Holanda
description: In the industrial area at a cheap gas station: hand wash incl. Roof. very good work. I am very pleased. small mobile home = 27.50 euros to large mobile home 8.50 meters = 37.50 euros Opening: 9 a.m. - 2 p.m. and 4 p.m. - 8 p.m. Saturday: 9 a.m. - 2 p.m.

title: (04621) Vera - 9 Avenida Ciudad de Alicante
description: It is a large parking lot in which you can spend the night without any problem, about 10m from the beach on foot, parking is totally free but it does not have any type of service, but you have a small shopping center with bars, shops, and a CONSUM supermarket right in front of you.

title: (30890) Puerto Lumbreras - 1 Calle Alemania
description: Low cost gas station with sinks and showers. Open 24 hours. Served by the truck parking staff next door.

title: (30889) Águilas - RM-D15
description: Easy parking next to the coastal road on the beach. Sea view, 1.5 km to a supermarket and bakery. Garbage disposal in the village, 500 m. Do not park on the sea side, it is forbidden. Good, wide access. No overnight.

title: (04662) Huércal-Overa - Autovía del Mediterráneo
description: For technical stop and water recharge at the bottom to the right as soon as you enter the restaurant parking lot. You can also evacuate black in the sink on the ground. Grays I have not seen. You have a good lunch and at a good price. One from Aracena.

title: (04621) Vera - 1 Calle Delfin
description: Vera Praia parking, pay attention the vehicle must not be exceeded on the pavement when parking.

title: (04620) Vera - A-352
description: Good service station, auto gas, fuel, wash car and free not drinkable water.

title: (04621) Vera - 14A Avenida Ciudad de Alicante
description: A perfect place for a picnic, with around 30 tables, around 10 barbecues, a fountain and a toilet, although it was closed when we were there. Lots of shade!

title: (30889) Calabardina - 2 Calle Canalicas
description: Public parking on the beach.

name: Área el jardín del viajero
title: (30813) Área el jardín del viajero
description: For long periods, decreasing rate. Cozy and family place, there is a Pizzeria restaurant, and a cafeteria / brasserie, There is a large terrace, there is a large playground for children. 15 minutes from the beaches of Aguilas, 30 km from the Pulpi geode. 12 minutes from the center of Lorca, near a gas station and supermarket, 8 minutes from a shopping center.

title: (04621) Vera - 13 Calle de las Washingtonias
description: Mixed parking residential area in line and in holes in the sidewalk, very quiet to spend the night, lit and with garbage cans, almost level.

title: (30889) Calabardina - 19 Calle Vicente Aleixandre
description: Mixed tarmac parking accessible to any size motorhome 150 meters from the beach Trash cans Night lighting Quiet residential area

title: (30889) Calabardina - 2 Calle la Dorada
description: Large parking space close to the sea. Quiet at night.

title: (30889) Águilas - 19 Calle Abenarabi
description: Pitch with sea view

title: (30889) Calabardina - 12 Calle Golondrina
description: Perfect for an overnight stay. very quiet high-end residential area. flat ground and garbage nearby.

title: (04621) Vera - 1 Avenida Chafarinas
description: Iara place to come and be able to park with peace of mind !!! And the best with a great shade we have spent the day without any problem and with good air

title: (04621) Vera - 176 Calle Magallanes
description: Selfservice laundry, 9euros for 20kg, 7euros for 12kg, total of 4 washing machines and 2 dryers (1euro for 8minutes at midle temperature).

title: (04621) Vera - 366 Paseo Marítimo
description: Small parking at the end of the seafront promenade of Vera, next to the lagoon, next to two restaurants, quiet at this season, water possible on the beach.

title: (04629) Aljariz - unnamed road
description: Recreational area there are tables, benches and shade under the trees that are more suitable for vans, generally not crowded except on holidays or weekends when there are people, there are no signs prohibiting overnight stays

title: (30889) Águilas - 13 Lugar el Garrobillo
description: Drinking water fountain with threaded connection

title: (30813) Lorca - 184 Camino de Vera
description: Autovía A7 salida 636 dirección camino verá 184 .Do you want to rest or relax among a field of olive and orange trees? See the stars outside of light pollution? We are in a large fenced and private area, where you can rest with your motorhome. We have an equipped kitchen (refrigerator, oven, sink...) and a bathroom with sink, shower and washing machine. We have a swimming pool where you can enjoy a relaxing swim and sunbathe, we also have a wood-fired barbecue. We are very close to the shopping center where you can do your shopping, do not hesitate to contact us. We will be happy to receive you

title: (30889) Águilas - 26 Diseminado Cope
description: Quiet place, very close to the road, the sea is also very close. It does not have a sandy beach. Lots of flies.

title: (04621) Vera - 43 Calle Desplatación
description: Quiet, level and shaded parking. It also has services, a shower and a snack bar where you can eat very well

title: (30889) Águilas - 38 RM-D15
description: Mora Turtle Beach RV Park. Camper place directly on the beach. Quiet area surrounded by fields. Chiringuito, good food, unbeatable location on the beach. Bread is available from 10:30 a.m. at reception. Supermarket and shops 2.5 km

title: (04621) Vera - 78 Paseo Marítimo
description: Small car park for around twenty nice motorhomes just in front of the beach

title: (04630) Garrucha - 4 Calle Tenis
description: The supermarket offers 2 places for motorhomes, ideal for shopping and lunch in the many restaurants along the port.

title: (04628) Antas - 8 Diseminado Garrapancho
description: Area to rest, refuel, wash the AC and eat in the exceptional kitchen of Asador Los Cántaros where both menu and à la carte will be well eaten and served.

name: Shell Puerta de Vera | Antas
title: (04628) Shell Puerta de Vera | Antas
description: Shell petrol station with RV service. The water is not drinking water. The threaded tap is simply hidden in the key box. Otherwise there are two normal taps without a thread next to it. You need to ask at the gas station for the key to the closet where you can connect the water hose (thread). You can also take a hot shower at the gas station.

title: (04630) Garrucha - 18 Calle Mayor
description:
Launderette - self service
Spotlessly clean washing machines. Parking spaces for mobile homes rather not, at most on the Mercadona, which is maybe 100 meters away, or down at the port.

title: () Garrucha - 333 Puerto de Garrucha
description: Good place, no service but we were 3 campers and at 10pm we left because from the beach promenade above a gang of children were having fun throwing stones at the big campers. They might do some damage, the police arrived in 50 seconds. Excellent. They fled, but we didn't trust each other to spend the night. Recently, the vehicle size has been limited to 5m. 03/23/2022

title: (30889) Aguilas -
description: Good place in peace and far from urban beaches and so much mobility of people.

title: (30876) Lorca - 23 N-332
description: Good lunch or overnight stop on what was the old road before a new bridge and road section built. Incredibly beautiful views, road doesn't carry much traffic so no noise problem.

title: (04630) Garrucha - 121 Calle Mayor
description: It is a self-service laundry, but also has specialized dry cleaning.

title: (04630) Garrucha - 4541 Calle Murillo
description: Very spacious parking and there is always room 200m from the beach and Lidl nearby.

title: (04692) Taberno - Unnamed Road
description: Restaurant with swimming pool. Services water drain and electricity, wifi.

title: (04629) Antas - AL-600
description: A large gravel area between a quiet AL- road and a dry river bed. Mostly level. Good firm surface. No buildings in sight from the spot. Very quiet - we heard no traffic overnight. Very little mobile phone signal.

title: (30813) Lorca - 763 Diseminado Campillo
description: Parque Almenara shopping center parking, no service but Carrefour supermarket and its impeccable wifi, plus the wifi from the shopping center to the parking lot

title: (30813) Lorca - 62 Autovía Lorca-Águilas
description: Water tap in the gas station parking lot. Water not drinkable but it's free. There is also fuel and garbage cans.

title: (04630) Garrucha - A-370
description: Here you can buy gas cylinders with a contract.

title: (30815) Lorca/Aguaderas - Carretera Malvaloca 174
description: Private parking space on a fenced plot

title: (30876) Lorca - 28 Diseminado Garrobillo
description: One of the many possible places along the coast to Cap Cope very popular in winter by northern Europeans who are permanently installed with large buses. Coastal track also accessible by van. A treat for mountain biking.

title: (04638) Mojácar - 2 Avenida El Palacio
description: Spectacular place to rest and spend the night, very quiet and incredible views

title: (04638) Garrucha - 11 Calle el Ferrol
description: Dead end street with parking bays on the side. No houses nearby, very quiet at night. parking allowed, also at night.

title: (30890) Lorca - 127 Paraje Zarzalico
description: Parking Henares Cemetery.  Flat. Overlooks the village and the surrounding fruit plantations. No shadow. Very calm. OK for a night stop. With a clean toilet, that’s actually open.

title: (04638) Mojácar - 21 Calle Marqués de Chavarri
description: It is an uninhabited cul-de-sac that is very wide and not far from the beach. Quiet nobody bothers you. View over the whole country. Highly recommended.

title: (30876) Lorca - 27 Diseminado Garrobillo
description: Only for off-road vehicles. On a fantastic beach

title: (30876) Lorca - Unnamed Road
description: Lonely parking space directly on the sea. No supply and disposal. Space can be reached via a gravel road. The last 20 meters are a bit narrower. It still lapped with our VW Bulli without 4x4. Worthwhile for those who prefer peace and absolute solitude.

title: (30890) Lorca - 96 Paraje Zarzalico
description: Parking by the road, but not very noisy, with a beautiful view

title: (04650) Zurgena -
description: Small platform by the road, calm and peaceful place between the hills. We spent the night there.

title: (30890) Henares -
description: Site very close to the highway, but very quiet, beautiful sunset

title: (30876) Lorca - Unnamed Road
description: Couple of level spots at the stone beach. No shade, no services

title: (30813) Lorca - km.08 Autovía Lorca-Águilas
description: Fuel station with Autogas/LPG, next to a main road. Good accessibility.

title: (30876) Los Curas -
description: On the side of the road but incredible view! Very little traffic.

title: (30876) Lorca - 110 Lugar Ramonete
description: Quiet parking lot among the ruins.

title: (30890) Lorca - 93 A-91
description: To spend the night or stop on the way to Granada ... next to the motorway ... large parking lot with table and trees (garbage and a little dirty place) ... little traveled, we were the only ones and had a very quiet night although the highway is heard a little ...

title: (04638) Mojácar - 3 Avenida del Mar
description: Beach parking area on the same road and close to hotels and urbanizations, as well as a beach bar.

title: (30815) Campo López -
description: Slightly offset from the road, an area for 2 or 3 vans. View of the mountains (not spectacular anyway). Absolute calm, a few cyclists on the road.

title: (30876) Los Curas -
description: Great place in the middle of nowhere to rest and enjoy nature. On a road that seems to have very little traffic. No services! No prohibition signs!

name: Camping Los Gallardos
title: (04289) Camping Los Gallardos
description:
Camping Los Gallardos is an excellent site near Mojácar, convenient for the motorway and all the main areas around.
Large hard pitches.
Wifi, electricity, water, shop, swimming pool, bar & restaurant. Open all year round and very busy in winter. All good value for money.

title: (30876) Lorca - RM-D20
description: Breathtaking place. very windy. but the panorama repays everything when you wake up in the morning. parking behind the antenna. lost in nothingness

title: (30800) Lorca - 87 Carretera de Granada
description: Supermarket with dining area, with microwave, biodegradable cutlery, tables. it is possible to buy food inside and heat it up and consume it in the dining area. spacious and clean bathrooms. free parking

title: (30815) Lorca - 363 Diseminado Aguaderas
description: Wide esplanade of land next to the hermitage, among olive trees. 13 km from Lorca, and on the road that goes to Campo López. There is little shade. Fairly level ground. We had a very quiet night.
